mapper.sql: audio_id, audio_info, type_id, download_num, download_url, filename, is_examine, is_delete, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by
mapper.select: SELECT playgoer_name, playgoer_info, playgoer_avatar, audio_id, audio_info, type_name, download_num, download_url, filename, audio.playgoer_id, audio.created_at, audio.created_by, audio.updated_at FROM playgoer INNER JOIN (SELECT playgoer_id, audio_id, audio_info, type_name, download_num, download_url, filename, audio.created_at, audio.created_by, audio.updated_at FROM sys_account INNER JOIN (SELECT audio_id, audio_info, type_name, download_num, download_url, filename, opera_audio.created_at, opera_audio.created_by, opera_audio.updated_at FROM opera_audio INNER JOIN opera_type ON opera_audio.type_id = opera_type.type_id WHERE audio_id = #{audioId}) AS audio ON sys_account.account_id = audio.created_by) AS audio ON playgoer.playgoer_id = audio.playgoer_id

SELECT oa.audio_id, oa.filename, oa.download_num, IFNULL(oc.num, 0) AS commentNum, updated_at FROM opera_audio AS oa LEFT JOIN (SELECT audio_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM opera_audio_comment WHERE is_delete = 0 GROUP BY audio_id) AS oc ON oa.audio_id = oc.audio_id WHERE is_delete = 0
AND updated_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND NOW()
AND updated_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND NOW()
AND updated_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 365 DAY) AND NOW()
ORDER BY oc.num DESC LIMIT 10
